page.title: 07A Factory Near Girvan
page.content: { Rowntree Mackintosh}at{Grangestone} {Industrial Estate,Girvan,}do not make the sweets,they just make chocolate crumb which is made of{cocoa, milk and {sugar.} The chocolate crumb gets sent out to Rowntree Mackintosh in {Canada,York,Spain}and{Jamaica. } They have 51 employees but only{4} female workers,2 in the offices and 2 in the lab.The factory produces 3-5 tons a week and they take in{1 million {litres}of milk a week.The employee that has to travel the furthest comes from Barassie,40 miles from Girvan. The factory was built outside Girvan in 1980 because it was a good site and has good drainage and the factory has expanded over the years.
